name: AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions
desc: Options that affect the parsing of Markdown content into an attributed string.

items.name: init(allowsExtendedAttributes: Bool, interpretedSyntax: AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions.InterpretedSyntax, failurePolicy: AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions.FailurePolicy, languageCode: String?)
items.desc: Creates a Markdown parsing options instance with the specified values.

items.name: var allowsExtendedAttributes: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether parsing allows extensions to Markdown that specify extended attributes.

items.name: var failurePolicy: AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions.FailurePolicy
items.desc: The policy for handling a parsing failure.

items.name: enum AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions.FailurePolicy
items.desc: A type that represents policies for handling parsing failures.

items.name: var interpretedSyntax: AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions.InterpretedSyntax
items.desc: The syntax for interpreting a Markdown string.

items.name: enum AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions.InterpretedSyntax
items.desc: A type that represents the syntax for interpreting a Markdown string.

items.name: var languageCode: String?
items.desc: The language code for this document.
